Name: Golden Fizz No.2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel and mint sprigs.
STIR honey with gin in base of shaker until honey is dissolved.
Add next 3 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring lemonade.
Garnish with orange slice and mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: More cloudy white than golden but a pleasant, refreshing long drink all the same.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in the late 1990s by Wayne Collins , London, England.
